overview: Charlie, a very gifted, young acrobat, cannot find employment.  A dancer and colleague, whom he trained, has gotten him a job as a stagehand at a vaudeville theatre.  After a number of chaotic events and some highs and lows - none of which ever discourage him - his hour arrives:  an act can't go on and "Akrobat schööön" can finally make his grand entrance.
title: Akrobat schö-ö-ö-n
